Summary: Great natural moisturizer - even revived an old leather chair!
text: I've been using this as a moisturizer on my dry, itchy winter skin and have been very pleased.  It seems greasy at first, but within minutes it is absorbed and doesn't get on your clothes.  We had a leather chair that was getting too dry and was cracking so I thought, why not give it a try?  It worked great.  No more expensive leather conditioner for us.  I will be buying more.
